data.name: Goblin
data.description:
The Horde - Goblin [R]
Units:
-30% buy cost
+2 hp regeneration (affects mechanical units only)

Buildings:
+10% attack rate

Upgrades:
+3Lv Ranged Weapons

Magic:
Concussion (Gives enemy 25% chance to miss)
Rage Potion (+15% attack rate for 60s)
Grenade (Deals 150 damage in 200 AoE)

Traits: Goblins have frail little bodies so they have to relay on their wits and more or less powerful mechanical contraptions. And, of course, explosions. Lots and lots and lots of EXPLOSIONS.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Trade Routes Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Devotion Aura
auras.description:
+6 unit armor
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: True Aim Aura
auras.description:
+20% ranged unit and structure damage
(2500 range)

Lane Push Aura

bonuses.name: Hidden and Dangerous [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Pointy Rounds

Reduces spell damage to Brawler, Engineer, Sapper, Alchemist and Blaster by 20%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Mega Nerd [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of KABOOM

Tech Geek replaces Brawler
Melee Unit
+10% attack rate
+125 HP
Abilities:
Si-Fi Blades (Passive Skill)
(10% to do 25 damage)
Si-Fi Shield (Passive Skill)
(20% to block an attack)
Gold Disappearance (Passive Skill)
(waste 3/6/9/12 gold from kill)
Upgrades used:
Scrap Salvage (Upgrades Abilities)
Mylee Wypons
Leather Armor
Lo BLOW
Got Wrencz

Type: Early Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Advanced Alchemy [X]
bonuses.description:
Icreases Outpost and Alchemist mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Outpost spells by 30%.

Type: Magic Power / Base Defence

upgrades.name: Power Generator
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Outpost mana reg

upgrades.name: Potent Stuff
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+12 Alchemist damage
-10% Alchemist spell cooldown
Concussion Potion +10% miss chance
Rage Potion +5% attack rate
Grenade +50 damage

upgrades.name: Refinement
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+5% building attack rate
+15 Gun Turret damage
+15 Armory damage
+20 Outpost damage

bonuses.name: Master Blaster [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Inspiration Aura
+1 level of Scrap Salvage

Scrap Bot replaces Blaster
Siege Unit
+3 armor
+150 HP
Abilities:
Metal Harvester (Passive Skill)
(restores 25/50/75/100/125 HP on kill)
Iron Fisting (Passive Skill)
(15% chance to attack twice)
Upgrades used:
Scrap Salvage (Upgrades Abilities)
Mylee Wypons
Leather Armor
Inspiration Aura
Spere Parts

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.name: Air Fortress [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of BOOM Rounds

Airship replaces Zeppelin
Air Unit
+10% attack rate
+200 HP
Abilities:
AA Heatseekers (Damage Spell)
(400 damage to Air unit)
Last Landing (Passive Skill)
(drops 2 Demolition Team on death)
Upgrades used:
BOOMpowder
Leather Armor
BOOM Rounds
Spere Parts

Type: Air Power / Anti Air

bonuses.name: Recycling Factory [C]
bonuses.description:
Repurposes your destoryed mechanical units, allowing you to use them again in different ways

Type: Unit Utility / Unique Bonus

spells.name: Sell the wastes [Q]
spells.description: You receive 250 gold

spells.name: Emergency repair [E]
spells.description: Heals your selected mechanism for 2500 HP.

spells.name: Metal recycling [W]
spells.description: Summons 2 Scrap Bot, 0 Airship, 0 Stym Roller at chosen Barrack or Fortress.

spells.name: Recycling Factory
spells.description:
Repurposes your destoryed mechanical units, allowing you to use them again in different ways

Type: Unit Utility / Unique Bonus

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Bombardier [A]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Flamable Stuff

Bombardier replaces Alchemist
Spellcaster
+5% attack rate
+50 HP
+75 MP
Abilities:
Fire Grenade (Damage Spell)
(3/6/9/12 dmg for 10 sec in 200 AoE)
(Un)stable Bot (Summoning Spell)
(summons 1 Goblin Bot for 25 sec)
(deals 20/30/40/50 dmg in 200 AoE on death)
Upgrades used:
Alchemy (Upgrades Abilities)
Leather Armor
Flamable Stuff

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Goblin Shooter [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Got Wrencz

Goblin Shooter replaces Engineer
Range Unit
+20% attack rate
+75 HP
+8 damage
Abilities:
Found on Ground ammo (Orb Effect)
(-3/-5/-7/-9/-12 armor reduction for 6 sec)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)
PUR Gel (Disable Spell)
(dispels buffs, slows for 5s)
Upgrades used:
Got Wrencz (Upgrades Abilities)
BOOMpowder
Leather Armor
Pointy Rounds

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.description:

Goblin Demolisher replaces Zeppelin
Support Unit (Ground/Range)

+300 HP
Abilities:

(+3 HP/sec regeneration aura)
(affects mechanical units only)

(give Pointy Rounds ability on target)
Upgrades used:
BOOMpowder
Leather Armor
BOOM Rounds
Spere Parts

bonuses.name: Technological Breakthrought [Q]
bonuses.description:
X0-Z9 replaces Attack Bot 2000

Special Unit (Melee/Mechanical)
-10% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher

Can learn:

325-475 damage in an area
(30 second cooldown)

Pocket Factory (Summoning Spell)
summons Goblin reinforcement every 15s
(60-90 second cooldown)

Heavy Bash (Passive Skill)
15-27% to stun for 1.4-2s

Overclocked (Self Spell)
20-50% bonus AS in 20s
(45 second cooldown)

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Devil's Tongue [Z]
bonuses.description:

+1 level of Demolition Egspert

Stym Roller replaces Rocket Buggy

+800 HP
Abilities:

(200 damage in a line)
Repair Bots (Self Spell)

Upgrades used:
BOOMpowder
Leather Armor
BOOM Rounds
Spere Parts
KABOOM

Type: Late Game Push / Unit Power

towerUpgrades.name: KABOOM
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage upon death
Affects: Blaster and Rocket Buggy

Lv1: 30 damage in 100 AoE
Lv2: 45 damage in 120 AoE
Lv3: 60 damage in 140 AoE
Lv4: 75 damage in 160 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Got Wrencz
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: healing ability
Affects: Brawler and Engineer
(affects mechanical units only)

Lv1: restores 100 HP
Lv2: restores 200 HP
Lv3: restores 300 HP
Lv4: restores 400 HP

spells.name: Repair
spells.description: Can repair a friendly mechanical unit for 100 hit points.

towerUpgrades.name: BOOM Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun on each attack
Affects: Zeppelin, Sapper and Rocket Buggy
(does not affect Special unit)
(has 0.5s duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 12% chance for 1.2 sec stun
Lv2: 24% chance for 1.4 sec stun
Lv3: 36% chance for 1.6 sec stun
Lv4: 48% chance for 1.8 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Inspiration Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage to nearby units
Affects: Blaster

Lv1: +10% damage in 400 AoE
Lv2: +20% damage in 500 AoE
Lv3: +30% damage in 600 AoE
Lv4: +40% damage in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Scrap Salvage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus gold for a kill
Affects: Blaster

Lv1: 6 gold per kill
Lv2: 12 gold per kill
Lv3: 18 gold per kill
Lv4: 24 gold per kill

towerUpgrades.name: Spere Parts
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus HP and regeneration
Affects: All mechanical units

Lv1: +50 hit points, +2 HP/s
Lv2: +100 hit points, +4 HP/s
Lv3: +150 hit points, +6 HP/s
Lv4: +200 hit points, +8 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Pointy Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage on each attack
Affects: Engineer and Gun Turret
(also stuns for 0.6 sec)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10% chance for 15 damage
Lv2: 20% chance for 30 damage
Lv3: 30% chance for 45 damage
Lv4: 40% chance for 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Flamable Stuff
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Alchemist
(affects buildings only)

Lv1: 10 damage/sec for 10 seconds
Lv2: 20 damage/sec for 12 seconds
Lv3: 30 damage/sec for 14 seconds
Lv4: 40 damage/sec for 16 seconds

spells.name: Arcane Shield
spells.description: An impenetrable shield surrounds this unit, protecting it from all damage and spells for 3 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Demolition Egspert
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has BUUBY Trep (invisible damage trap)
100/200/300/400 damage
Lv2: has Scrap Mine (invisible stun trap)
30/60/90 sec duration, 2/3/4 sec stun
Lv3: has Demolition Aura (reduces armor)
-3/-6 armor to buildings
Lv4: has Sentry Gun (attacks enemies)
summons 1 turret

spells.name: Land Mine
spells.description: Places land mine.

spells.name: Serpent Wards - [Level 4]
spells.description: Summons sentry gun.

skills.name: Spell Resist
skills.description: Reduces spell damage by 45%.
Gives a 20% percent chance to avoid an attack.

spells.name: BUUBY Trep
spells.description: Summons an invisible ward that stuns enemy land units around it. The stun lasts 2 seconds.

heroes.name: Goblin Basher
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Hybrid (Tank/Fighter)

Can learn:
Electroshock (Damage Spell)
125-275 damage, 20-32% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Pulverize (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 120-240 area damage

STRAPON ArmorKit (Passive Skill)
8-20% to block an attack

Emergency Repairs (Self Spell)
restores 400-1000 HP over 10s
(45 second cooldown)

skills.name: Electroshock - [Level 4]
skills.description: Deals 200 damage and slows by 26% for 10 seconds.

skills.name: Regeneration - [Level 1]
skills.description: Heals 400 hit points over 10 seconds.

heroes.name: Alchemist
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Range)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Healing Potion (Healing Spell)
500-800 HP to 3-9 units
(30 second cooldown)

Overload (Support Spell)
10-22% attack rate bonus
(affects mechanical units only)
(60 second cooldown)

Fire Grenade (Damage Spell)
Deals 175-325 dmg in 225-325 AoE
(30 second cooldown)

Transmutation (Economy Boost)
turns 1 enemy unit into 75-225 gold
(30 second cooldown)

skills.name: Healing Potion - [Level 4]
skills.description: Heals up to 3 units for 200 hit points.

skills.name: Overload - [Level 1]
skills.description: Increases attack rate of mechanical units by 15%.

skills.name: Frost Nova - [Level 4]
skills.description: Blasts enemy units with a wave of frost that deals <AUfn,DataB4> damage to the target, and <AUfn,DataA4> nova damage. Cold damage slows units' movement and attack rate for <AUfn,Dur4> seconds.

heroes.name: Tinker

225-375 damage
(300-450 area of effect)
